/usr/bin/CC  -std=c++11 -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/ltp_server.dir/ltp_server.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ltp_server.dir/mongoose.c.o  -o /root/ltp/ltp/bin/ltp_server  -L/root/ltp/ltp/lib -Wl,-rpath,/root/ltp/ltp/lib /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libmaxent.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libltp.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libsplitsnt.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libsegmentor.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libpostagger.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libparser.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libner.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libsrl.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libxml4nlp.a -lpthread /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libboost_program_options.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libboost_regex.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libboost_serialization.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libjsoncpp.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libsrl_srl_static_lib.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libdynet.so /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libboost_regex.a -lpthread /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libcommon_static_lib.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libbase_static_lib.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libboost_program_options.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libboost_serialization.a /root/ltp/ltp/lib/libtinyxml.a
